title: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation Metadata
description: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation Metadata

id.description: The unique identifier of the calculation.

taxYear.description: The tax year in which the calculation was performed in the format YYYY-YY

requestedBy.description: The requestor of the calculation. Currently agent will default to customer until it can be supported.

calculationReason.description: The reason why the calculation was triggered

oneOf.description: The calculation was triggered by the customer via software.
The calculation was triggered internally by HMRC once the actual Class 2 NIC amount is available. This event is only applicable for an in-year "crystallisation" calculation type.

The calculation was triggered internally by HMRC on receipt of a new pre-MTD brought forward loss made by the customer. This event is only applicable for a "crystallisation" calculation type. This event is not currently supported and will be supported in the future.

The calculation was triggered internally by HMRC on receipt of a new loss claim made by the customer. This event is only applicable for a "crystallisation" calculation type. This event is not currently supported and will be supported in the future.

The calculation was triggered internally by HMRC on receipt of an updated loss claim made by the customer. This event is only applicable for a "crystallisation" calculation type. This event is not currently supported and will be supported in the future.

The calculation was triggered internally by HMRC on receipt of an updated pre-MTD brought forward loss made by the customer. This event is only applicable for a "crystallisation" calculation type. This event is not currently supported and will be supported in the future.
The calculation was triggered internally by HMRC on receipt of a request for a new adjustable summary calculation by the customer. This event is not currently supported.
The calculation was triggered internally by HMRC on receipt of an adjustment to an adjustable summary calculation made by the customer. This event is not currently supported.
The calculation was triggered without attendence <filler content>. This event is not currently supported.

calculationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the calculation was performed in ISO8601 UTC format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

calculationType.description: The type of calculation performed. A "crystallisation" calculation is a calculation triggered via the "Intent to crystallise" endpoint under the "Self Assessment (MTD)" API.

intentToCrystallise.description: Boolean value showing whether the calculation is intended to be crystallised against. Valid values are true or false

crystallised.description: Boolean value showing whether the calculation is intended to be crystallised against. Valid values are true or false

totalIncomeTaxAndNicsDue.description: The total amount of Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions due. This field is not present if the calculationErrorCount value is greater than zero. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

calculationErrorCount.description: A count of error messages generated during the calculation. If the field is present it indicates a calculation has not been performed. Further detail can be found in the "Retrieve Self Assessment tax calculation messages" endpoint about the errors.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description:
A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource
The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
